text:
Message 824 of 4024
Hmmmm.... I guess I don’t know how this works yet. You seem to read. But then you don’t reply. But then I say something and you take shot. But
we don’t answer each other’s questions or respond when the question asked was answered.
I am not trying to insult you. It is not a knock. But if this is the singular way we are going to communicate about a single topic, I guess I should
calibrate my expectations. If i am doing this wrong, please let me know so we can be more effective.
Do you mind letting me know the Canada agenda since it is an international trip? Just for peace of mind.
If this is how it’s going to work, or not, and this is actually the “fast track” may I please ask for a possible path forward that will get us back to
Monday?
I assure you that I understand your concerns and will not cross your boundaries again if given the opportunity to collaborate better again.
Sent:01/26/2024 at 03:46 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/26/2024 at 09:43 PM)
Subject:Re: We Can Do This!!!  <<Outstanding Issues Fork>>
Attachments:IMG_1069.PNG (1 MB)
Message 825 of 4024
I will work through Lisa. We have a com from Hinano.
I hope it is ok to give a heads up here. If not, please advise and I assure you it will never be repeated.
Sent:01/26/2024 at 05:25 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/26/2024 at 09:45 PM)
Subject:Alki
Message 826 of 4024
So... I know this is after hours. But you have some precious cargo. Mind letting me know when he arrives safely? I love him, and his driver more than
life itself.
Sent:01/26/2024 at 08:31 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/26/2024 at 09:46 PM)
Subject:Safe Arrival
Message 827 of 4024
Thank you for the email.
I thought I had shared but we are in Canada now and plan to return Sunday night. Max is at Lisa’s for the evenings and will manage his way
homebodies and Ski over the weekend.
Sent:01/26/2024 at 09:45 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/26/2024 at 10:45 PM)
Subject:Re: We Can Do This!!!  <<Outstanding Issues Fork>>
